actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow persons covered by certain other retirement plans to establish personal savings for retirement.

summary.text: Allows as deductions under the Internal Revenue Code amounts paid in cash by or on behalf of an individual: (1) to an employee's trust; or (2) for the purpose of an annuity contract as defined in the Code. Establishes the limitations on such deductions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow persons covered by certain other retirement plans to establish personal savings for retirement.
